name: I Frog-ot
description:
Just a normal day in your house when,

What's This?!?


A Super Cool Wizard Frog needs your help!! :o
His name is Diego, and he needs your help to get back to normal :)))
He’s got frog amnesia, and frog-ot how to fix himself :((





Help Diego get back to normal by gathering potion ingredients for him in this SUPER cute, harmless, perfectly normal game!!!


Features:


  • A short horror game! 30 minutes to an hour long :O
  • Cute, low poly art style, set inside a house!
  • Wake up, not everything is as it seems.
  • Choose which ingredients to use in your house, to build a potion for Diego! :)
  • You can even s̸͈̮̍͂ă̸̦̈́̉ċ̵̡͚̤̇͂̌r̷̰̰͇͇̉i̷̼̭͠f̶̧̏̕ͅi̵̼͕̙̘͆̈́̋̀c̷̩̳̀͆͝è̵̤̿͠͠ ̷͇̘̫̣͒̄̏̈́ý̸͚̰̼̜͛̐́ö̷̢̭́̈́ű̵̬̮̝̪r̷̛͓̫̄̉͂ ̴̡͓̌f̸̛̜͆̓̈́ȑ̷͎͕ͅi̷͍͙̣̗͐̍͂ë̸͖́ṉ̷̈́͗d̴̡̠͖͕̀s̶̪͛̿̿͂!!
  • Three endings >:D (So choose wisely)
